dcterms:description: The Tencent corpus consists of around 14,000 Chinese speech clips with and without reverberation, ranging from 5 to 13.5 seconds long.
dcterms:title: Tencent corpus

dcterms:creator: G. Yi

dcterms:description: The Public switched telephone network (PSTN) corpus consists of 80,000 English speech samples based on LibriVox with a length of 10 seconds each, containing both clean samples as well as samples with artificial background noise.
dcterms:title: Public switched telephone network (PSTN) corpus

dcterms:creator: G. Mittag
B. Naderi
A. Chehadi
S. Möller
dcterms:description: The Non-intrusive speech quality assessment (NISQA) corpus is a collection of more than 14,000 English and German speech clips with real as well as simulated noise.
dcterms:title: Non-intrusive speech quality assessment (NISQA) corpus

dcterms:creator: C. Richey

dcterms:description: The IU Bloomington (IUB) corpus comprises 36,000 English speech samples from the VOiCES and COSINE datasets, ranging from three to six seconds long.
dcterms:title: IU Bloomington (IUB) corpus
